item.title: 28 May 2021 20:16
item.description:
It just struck me today how much I love writing crude, rewarding code. The type that is just sufficient to get the job done and that which ‘scratches your itch’ and might probably be useful for someone else too. I am not a software developer. Never … https://t.co/gP3b4okbt8
